name: Something Terrible Has Happened!
description:
Good news: you (and three others) survived the apocalypse.
Bad news: you have to agree on what to do next.

This is a narrative-driven game with branching paths.

As a submission to the Heritage Game Jam, it explores the idea of heritage as he outcome of spontaneous, and often unplanned, interactions and decisions. How can we know which of our choices will matter, and which won't?

In this case, you can play until the end to find out!

---

NOTE: THIS IS AN UNFINISHED, UNPOLISHED GAME JAM SUBMISSION. We have not yet managed to incorporate the sound/music, animation, and narrative features prepared for the game. In addition, we were not able to remove all bugs/crashes, and specifically have noticed the final scene does not load in some cases. We apologize for any unexpected inconvenience in the current gameplay experience!
